name: Goblin Warren
description: A network of caves inhabited by goblins and their cruel leader

entrance.name: Cave Entrance
entrance.description: A dark opening in the hillside. The smell of unwashed bodies and rotting meat wafts from within.

guard_post.name: Guard Post
guard_post.description: A small chamber with crude wooden spikes pointing outward. Torch sconces cast flickering shadows on the walls.

storage_room.name: Storage Room
storage_room.description: Piles of stolen goods and provisions are scattered about. Barrels of ale line one wall.

main_hall.name: Main Hall
main_hall.description: A large cavern lit by a central fire pit. Crude beds and cooking implements suggest this is where the goblins live.

prison.name: Prison Cell
prison.description: Iron bars separate a small cell from the main passage. The cell appears empty now, but old bloodstains tell grim stories.

throne_room.name: Throne Room
throne_room.description: A grotesque throne made from bones and scrap metal dominates this chamber. The goblin boss sits here, surrounded by his most loyal guards.
